name: Train Master
description:
Have you ever wanted to manage your own train network? ...or thought you could do a better job? Here's your chance to be a Train Master.

★★★★★ REVIEWS ★★★★★

Featured by Touchreviews.net: 3 Stars

"...there are the obvious similarities between Train Master and the successful vehicle management applications that it follows such as Harbor Master, Taxi Jam and Flight Control there are a couple of differences that could make Train Master an App Store hit."

"...Train Master scores high on the addict-ability scoreboard with a constant feeling of just having one more try to beat your high score making this game a must have."

"Fun alternative to vehicle management with a twist"

Reviewed by Iphonefootprint.com

"...Train Master is Addictive and Challenging"

"Hats off to the people who actually do this job. I would recommend this game."

★★★★★ THE CHALLENGE ★★★★★

You are the Train Master which means you are in charge of the trains on your rail network. You are responsible for managing the train arrivals to 3 stations. Sounds easy...? ...can you cope when it gets busy!

Simply direct the trains towards their designated stations:
- touch trains to change their direction
- use the junction switches to set the route
- don't let trains collide, otherwise the game is over
- avoid newly arriving trains on your rail network at the 3 train entry junction points

Train Master gives you your own iPhone or iPod Touch train set. Addictive gameplay and fun graphics will keep you entertained for hours!

★★★★★ GAME FEATURES ★★★★★

✔ 3 Train types each with their own characteristics
✔ Realistic train track and train bend animations
✔ Easy to operate junction and train direction control (simply tap once to toggle)
✔ Save and Resume exactly where you left off (e.g. to take a call or close the App to finish your game later)
✔ Listen to your own music whilst playing or enjoy the original sound track
✔ Stats screen to track your performance
✔ Game Center Support for 'Top Train Masters' Online Leaderboard
✔ Fast-forward function to speed up play

★★★★★ PLANNED UPDATES ★★★★★

- Additional tracks / themed levels
- More train types
